about_the_game:
Hi hi~! This is Akemi signing on!

Welcome to my new game, Kimochii Classroom! An atmospheric, slice-of-life visual novel with stunning visuals, a beautiful soundtrack, and an immersive story.

Filled to the brim with personality, Kimochii Classroom offers a loveable cast of characters and a meticulously crafted soundscape to bring the world to life!

You will follow Simon, a second year high school student, and his day-to-day life with his friends, coworkers, and little sister. Everyday Simon goes to school, works at his secret part-time job, and studies at home with his best friend Anna. Everything seems normal until Simon comes across a strange object that belongs to his classmate, Felicia. He doesn't know it yet, but he's stumbled into something much more complicated than he realizes.

Get to know the characters!

Annabelle - Annabelle, or 'Anna,' is Simon's best friend, and a classmate of his in class 201. Her outgoing and cheeky personality keeps Simon on his toes, and makes every day enjoyable! Anna is also super close with Chiko, so much so that many people think they're sisters!

Chiko - Chiko is Simon's little sister! She may be small, but she packs enough energy for everyone around her! On top of her already immaculate cooking skills, Chiko is practicing hard everyday to become an amazing singer and guitar player at her school's light music club!

Felicia - Felicia is another member of class 201 with Simon. She's known for her stunning looks and perfect grades, but Felicia is also known for being the heiress to the Arison corporation, a massive company with lots of influence!

Mayuka - 'Mayu' is a bartender and Simon's coworker at the 'Tumultuous Tap,' a local bar establishment Simon works at part time. Mayu is excellent at being professional, but often likes to show off her more playful and teasing side, like when Simon is around!

Support the game on Kickstarter!

The full game can only be made if funding is reached on Kickstarter, so if you enjoyed the demo, please consider supporting! Every little bit helps <3


I can't wait for you to meet and get to know all of my new characters, I hope you have fun~!

This has been Akemi, signing out!
